main event: A sighting of a round, light silver object reported in Akron, Ohio on July 24, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a pin head at arm's length.,The sighting lasted for approximately 5-10 minutes.,The object was observed by both civilian and military sources.,The altitude of the object was estimated to be about 15,000 feet.,The reporting officer suggested that it might have been a reflection off an aircraft due to the time of day.
